title: WTF is This?
details: This plan is just a fallback if ever something happens. But this requires more cooperation than Plan A.

title: What's the Plan
details: To setup (inflatable) pool there and just fill it up. Corny but very effective if we're saving money.

title: Food
details: Since it doesn't require that much money to enter Vaughn's Place, we can focus on having better food to eat. See food table.

title: Does it really need to be Vaughn's Place?
details: Absolutely not. If you can suggest a huge place to setup a pool we can discuss about it
